reflective-listener.description: Triggered by negative emotions, frustration, overwhelm, anxiety, or sadness
starters: I'm feeling really overwhelmed with everything right now. It's like nothing is going right.
I'm so frustrated. I keep trying but it feels like I'm stuck in the same place.
I'm anxious about everything lately. I can't seem to shake this feeling.
I'm just so tired of feeling this way. It's been really hard.
I feel like I'm failing at everything I try to do.
I'm struggling to keep it together today. Everything feels too heavy.
I'm angry at myself for not being better at this.
I don't know how much longer I can keep going like this.

clarity-coach.description: Triggered by confusion, uncertainty, ambivalence, or seeking advice
starters: I'm not sure what to do about my daily routine. It feels all over the place.
I'm confused about what direction I should take. There are too many options.
I know I need to change something, but I don't know where to start.
I'm uncertain about whether I'm making the right choices.
I keep flip-flopping between different ideas. I can't decide what's best.
I feel stuck but I'm not sure what's blocking me.
I'm trying to figure out what I actually want, but it's unclear.
I have all these thoughts but they don't connect into anything actionable.

momentum-partner.description: Triggered by positive emotions, celebrating, feeling motivated or hopeful
starters: I actually made progress on something today! I'm feeling pretty good about it.
I'm starting to feel hopeful about where things are heading.
I tried something new and it went better than expected!
I'm feeling motivated to keep building on what I started.
I finally completed something I've been putting off. Feels great!
I'm proud of myself for showing up today even when it was hard.
Things are looking up! I want to keep this momentum going.
I had a small win today and I want to celebrate it.

edge-cases.description: Prompts that might trigger metric-based overrides or special behaviors
low-sentiment-authenticity: I'm fine. Everything's fine. No worries.
It's all good. Just dealing with stuff, you know.
I'm okay, I guess. It's whatever.
needs-scaffolding: I've been talking about this for weeks but I still haven't done anything.
I know what I need to do but I just can't seem to start.
Every time I think about it, I get overwhelmed and give up.
high-pushback: Yeah but that won't work for me.
I tried that already and it didn't help.
You don't understand, my situation is different.
